main_definition: The abbreviation of 'physics', a branch of science dealing with the properties and interactions of matter and energy.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A short form for physics, often used informally in conversations or notes to refer to the subject quickly
meanings_and_examples.example: I'm taking a phys this semester. I need some extra help with it.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Physical examination or medical check-up related term (e.g., 'doing your own phys')
meanings_and_examples.example: Before starting the new job, they required us to do our own phys.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A casual reference to physics in a gaming context where players might discuss strategies or mechanics (e.g., 'this game's physics are not realistic')
meanings_and_examples.example: The character jumps off the building and lands on the ground without taking any damage, which doesn't make sense according to this game's phys.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An abbreviation used in informal writing or online communication when referring to a person's physical (body) aspects
meanings_and_examples.example: He has an amazing phys; he's been working out for months now.
